stepAnswer: Qualitative research focuses on understanding concepts and experiences, while quantitative research focuses on numerical data and statistical analysis.
stepBody: What is the primary difference between qualitative and quantitative research methods?
choices: Qualitative research focuses on numerical data, while quantitative research focuses on understanding concepts and experiences
Qualitative research focuses on understanding concepts and experiences, while quantitative research focuses on numerical data and statistical analysis.
Qualitative research is more reliable than quantitative research
Qualitative research is subjective and explores phenomena, while quantitative research is objective and measures variables
There is no difference; both methods use statistical analysis
